author: imman6820
content: I thought stETH should trade at a premium (>1 eth)  post withdrawals because it accounts for the revenue to each eth deposited and earned by the validators?

author: imman6820
content: So <1 eth pre merge to account for the risk of merge. ~1 post merge and pre withdrawals to account for risk of withdrawals not happening. And >1 post withdrawals with a negligible or at least non measurable discount for rug pull/smart contract risk

author: 0xsadcat
content: you can always deposit new eth at 1
